function.name: set_stereo_channel

description.p: The set_stereo_channel function takes a string specifying the stereo channel and returns the integer flag value.

function.returns: Returns 1 for a and 2 for b. On error, (-1) is returned.

function.name: set_fix_channel

description.p: The set_fix_channel function takes a string specifying the channel and returns the integer flag value.

function.returns: Returns 1-4 for a-d input strings. On error, (-1) is returned.
